channel.title: Skill Tab Tele
channel.description: How can I make it so if you click a skill in your skill tab it takes you somewhere? Like if I click the Slayer button, it takes me to slayer tower?

item.title: Skill Tab Tele
item.dc:creator: @Xandra Xandra
item.description:
@Xandra wrote:

jesus christ… THANKS DUDE! Its just some god damn help…

Read full topic

item.title: Skill Tab Tele

item.title: Skill Tab Tele
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

What did I do? Oh advertise?[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=sageofmali link=topic=446786.msg3279168#msg3279168 date=1279757591]
Here’s what you do lol. I just recently did this on my server, sagescape. Okay so go into clickingmost.java then go on you server and click a skill now on your run server cmd it should say something like clicked button: 33206(attack). Now go into clickingmost.java and search forcase 4146: now it should say case 73148: case 4146: c.triggerTele(2327, 3679, 0); c.killMyNPCs(); c.resetfollowers(); break;
So copy that and paste it under the break; now replace the 4146 with the case that you clicked. Attack is 33206 so it should look like this case 33206: c.triggerTele(2670, 3710, 0); c.killMyNPCs(); c.resetfollowers(); break;
If you need anymore help just write back. Remeber the runserver tells you what case it as in the forum of clickedbutton.
[/quote][quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=446786.msg3279115#msg3279115 date=1279755180]

How do I find the skill case id’s? XD

This is not a spoon feeding community.
[/quote]
Learn to read the rules.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Skill Tab Tele
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Here’s what you do lol. I just recently did this on my server, sagescape. Okay so go into clickingmost.java then go on you server and click a skill now on your run server cmd it should say something like clicked button: 33206(attack). Now go into clickingmost.java and search forcase 4146: now it should say case 73148: case 4146: c.triggerTele(2327, 3679, 0); c.killMyNPCs(); c.resetfollowers(); break;
So copy that and paste it under the break; now replace the 4146 with the case that you clicked. Attack is 33206 so it should look like this case 33206: c.triggerTele(2670, 3710, 0); c.killMyNPCs(); c.resetfollowers(); break;
If you need anymore help just write back. Remeber the runserver tells you what case it as in the forum of clickedbutton.
